I'd definitely recommend this place.

original_text: While driving around Chandler the other day, I happened to notice a Togo's delivery vehicle. I thought, what? Is Togo's back? Well, yes it is - yea! I have been eating at Togo's since 1979, and my favorites are the 21 (avocado and cheese) and 9 (hot pastrami). In my opinion, none of the other sub shops - Jimmy John's, Jersey Mikes, Subway, Firehouse, etc. - come close to the quality and taste of a genuine Togo's sub. I shall return soon!
